statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.InfoNoticeName , AA.UseYn
FROM dbo.TInfoNotice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.InfoNoticeName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.InfoNoticeName , AA.UseYn
FROM dbo.TInfoNotice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TInfoNotice ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, InfoNoticeName, UseYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #InfoNoticeName#, #UseYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TInfoNotice SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, InfoNoticeName = #InfoNoticeName# , UseYn = #UseYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM dbo.TInfoNoticeItem WHERE InfoNoticeID = #ID#; DELETE FROM dbo.TInfoNotice WHERE ID = #ID#;
